abstract: The industrial conglomerate, already moving to shed its huge lending arm, is trying to become even smaller.
snippet: The industrial conglomerate, already moving to shed its huge lending arm, is trying to become even smaller.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has already been moving to shed its huge lending arm. Now the industrial conglomerate is potentially becoming even smaller.

headline.main: G.E. to Seek Sale of Its Asset Management Arm

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
